thread.title: Vt. man to change plea in Sheffield grandmother's death
thread.title_full: Vt. man to change plea in Sheffield grandmother's death - WCAX.COM Local Vermont News, Weather and Sports-

author: wcax.com
title: Vt. man to change plea in Sheffield grandmother's death
text:
MONTPELIER, Vt. (AP) - One of three men charged with killing a grandmother in the Vermont town of Sheffield is due in court where he's expected to change his plea.
Michael Norrie is scheduled for a change of plea hearing Tuesday afternoon. He pleaded not guilty last year to first-degree murder, kidnapping and burglary in the death of Mary "Pat" O'Hagan during an attempted burglary.
Attorney Rob Sussman, representing Norrie, says he does not expect the 24-year-old to be sentenced at Tuesday's hearing. That will follow a pre-sentence investigation by the Department of Corrections.
Sussman says his client is not offering to testify against a co-defendant, 34-year-old Keith Baird, as part of the plea bargain.
